column1: peter-van-heezik-mba-a834479,Peter,Van Heezik MBA,Improving healthcare through digital innovations  | Sustainability | Anesthesia | Outcomes | Coaching for Growth | GE Healthcare,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D03AQHuDMd9KJ0bVg/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1608191287000?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=ycS_zcf9EzOMN-iAFCYJyomhNz68Zc_mkdHjMcuNR8w,https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E16AQE3tTD5Gsxmpg/profile-displaybackgroundimage-shrink_350_1400/0/1661415343083?e=1697673600&v=beta&t=ho0-VR1RVaN6Vevv-WW6NGQRxMZZrZmsqDyQ1O0B0H4,personal,ACoAAAGquUMBg4kbrLHnjeHSXFC6VEId4WuHcj4,27965763,,"Passionate entrepreneurial marketing and business executive with a track record in consistently exceeding business goals. Broad experience with building and leading innovative businesses comprised of healthcare informatics, medical systems, medical devices, and value added services
Experienced in international healthcare business, both in private and public companies, technology focus and innovation drive.

An innovative IT technology is NOT a solution. I am most proud when in close collaboration with customers after gaining a deep understanding of their clinical and business challenges a solution is designed that drives impact.  A successful solution will address People, processes & technology.
Passionate about Coaching and developing start-up healthcare companies.
